chapter1.title: 01. Skyscraper
chapter1.description: 'Heard about the guy who fell off a skyscraper? On his way down past each floor, he kept saying to reassure himself - so far, so good. How you fall doesn't matter, it's how you land.'

chapter1.title: 02. Abdel
chapter1.description: Abdel Ichaha, has been brutalized by the police shortly before the riot and lies in a coma.

chapter1.title: 06. Reflections
chapter1.description: The first time we get a glimpse at Vinz, he stares at himself in the mirror and re-enacts the famous scene from Taxi Driver

chapter1.title: 07. Talkin' To Me?
chapter1.description: We get insight into Vinz's inner aggression and rebellious thought process, an important facet of the film.

chapter1.title: 08. Hubert

chapter1.title: 09. Reason
chapter1.description: Hubert is shown as the voice of reason as Vinz reveals he plans to kill a policeman with a gun he received during the riots.

chapter1.title: 10. Aim
